question: The tibia is the larger, weight-bearing bone located on the medial side of the leg. the fibula is the slender bone of the lateral side of the leg and does not do what?

What are the two components of all solutions?

What do waves deposit to form sandbars and barrier islands?

What is the outer layer of the exoskeleton called?

What kind of hormones serve many functions in addition to promoting gamete production?
What are located along convergent and divergent plate boundaries?

What patterns in trees can be used to determine its age?
